WORDS: In this project,, I will retell the story on how Martin Luther King jr or MLK Jr was able to reach the famous historical event
I have a dream speech
Martin Luther King was born in Atlanta, Georgia
on January 15, 1929
MLK Jr was raised by his father, Martin Luther King Senior
and his mother, Alberta Williams King
Martin Luther KIng JR also have a younger brother, Alfred Daniel Williams King Senior
and an older sister, Christine KIng Farris
Martin Luther King Jr was the middle child
MLK Jr skipped 9th grade and 12th grade
He graduated high school at 15
He first earned a sociology degree from Morehouse College
Then, he earned a bachelor of divinity from the liberal Crozer Theological Seminary in Chester, Pennsylvania
He was at the top of his class in 1951
FInally, he went to earn a doctorate degree in systematic theology from Bosoton University in 1955
MLK Jr wanted to end racial discrimination and segregation in the U.S
After Rosa Park was arrested for refusing to give up her seat for a white man
MLK Jr organized the first major protest in 1955
Some other protest was the Albany movement in 1961 and the Birmingham campaign in 1963

WORDS: In 1963, Martin Luther King Jr gave his "I have a dream" speech
and the purpose was to show the public racial inequality in America and to persuade them to stop racism

WORDS: Martin Luther King Jr won the Noble Peace Prize in 1964 for his nonviolence protest against racism in America
MLK Jr helped pass the 15th amendments which allowed African Americans to vote
People were treated differently
and the civil right act of 1964 was passed which ended segregation in public places
On april 4, 1968, MLK Jr was shot and killed at the age of 39
He was shot and assassinated on his balcony of a hotel
Martin Luther King Jr was an social activist and Baptist minster who played a key role in the American civil rights movement
His actions helped pass act like the Civil right act of 1964 and changed African Americans' treatment
